Unakoti District Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 04 Medical Officer and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 17:18 IST
 Tripura Public Service Commission
 4 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Tripura |  Salary : 15,000 to 60,000




FOLLOW

Unakoti District has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Medical Officers, Nurse, Counsellor, and Data Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, ANM, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview along with the documents required at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Tripura.

Unakoti District Recruitment 2025  - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Medical Officer,	01	MBBS
Nurse	01	ANM
Counsellor	01	Any Degree
Data Manager	01

Age Limit for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.

Selection Process for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 15,00 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 60,000 / per month.

Application fee for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the Unakoti District Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or carer page.
Check for the Medical Officer Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview at the address given below along wth the application form and required documents.

Venue

Office of Rajiv Gandhi Memorial Subdivisional Hospital, Kailashahar, Unakot, Tripura

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	18-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
